mapper.select: SELECT ec.ID, et.NAME AS teacherName, ec.TITLE, ec.PRICE, ec.LESSON_NUM AS lessonNum, ec.COVER, et.id AS teacherid, es1.id AS subjectParentId, es2.id AS subjectId, ecd.description FROM edu_course ec LEFT OUTER JOIN edu_course_description ecd ON ec.id = ecd.id LEFT OUTER JOIN edu_teacher et ON ec.teacher_id = et.id LEFT OUTER JOIN edu_subject es1 ON ec.subject_parent_id = es1.id LEFT OUTER JOIN edu_subject es2 ON ec.subject_id = es2.id WHERE ec.id = #{courseId}
